words.source: H559 (אמר), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'And he said'.
H3588 (כִּי), HC (conjunction). Asseverative use here: 'certainly/surely'. KJV 'Certainly', ESV 'But', NASB 'Certainly'.
H1961 (היה), HVqi1cs (Qal-imperfect-1cs). KJV 'I will be', ESV 'I will be', NASB 'I will be'. All agree.
H5973 (עִם), HR/Sp2fs (preposition/suffix-2fs, pausal form for 2ms). KJV 'with thee', ESV 'with you', NASB 'with you'.
H2088 (זֶה), HC/Pdxms (conjunctive/demonstrative-pronoun-ms). KJV 'and this', ESV 'and this', NASB 'and this'.
Preposition lamed + suffix 2ms. KJV 'unto thee', ESV 'for you', NASB 'to you'.
H226 (אוֹת), HTd/Ncbsa (article/noun-common-both-singular-absolute). KJV 'a token', ESV 'the sign', NASB 'the sign'.
H3588 (כִּי), HC (conjunction). KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'. All agree.
H595 (אָנֹכִי), HPp1cs (personal-pronoun-1cs). KJV 'I', ESV 'I', NASB 'I'. All agree.
H7971 (שׁלח), HVqp1cs/Sp2ms (Qal-perfect-1cs/suffix-2ms). KJV 'have sent thee', ESV 'have sent you', NASB 'have sent you'.
H3318 (יצא), HR/Vhc/Sp2ms (preposition/Hiphil-infinitive-construct/suffix-2ms). KJV 'when thou hast brought forth', ESV 'when you have brought…out', NASB 'when you have brought…out'.
H853 (אֵת), HTo (direct object marker). Untranslated in English.
H5971 (עַם), HTd/Ncmsa (article/noun-common-ms-absolute). KJV 'the people', ESV 'the people', NASB 'the people'.
H4714 (מִצְרַיִם), HR/Np (preposition-min/proper-noun). KJV 'out of Egypt', ESV 'out of Egypt', NASB 'from Egypt'.
H5647 (עבד), HVqi2mp/Sn (Qal-imperfect-2mp/paragogic-nun). KJV 'ye shall serve', ESV 'you shall serve', NASB 'you shall worship'.
H853 (אֵת), HTo (direct object marker). Untranslated in English.
H430 (אֱלֹהִים), HTd/Ncmpa (article/noun-common-mp-absolute). KJV 'God', ESV 'God', NASB 'God'.
H5921 (עַל), HR (preposition). KJV 'upon', ESV 'on', NASB 'on'.
H2022 (הַר), HTd/Ncmsa (article/noun-common-ms-absolute). KJV 'this mountain', ESV 'this mountain', NASB 'this mountain'.
H2088 (זֶה), HTd/Pdxms (article/demonstrative-ms). KJV 'this', ESV 'this', NASB 'this'. All agree.
